overview:
Richard Lopez del Rincon assumed the role of Executive Vice President of CareCloud Corporation in January 2010. He is responsible for the management, growth and leadership of the Sales, Marketing and Implementation functions throughout the organization.

Mr. Lopez del Rincon is an experienced sales, marketing and revenue cycle management (RCM) executive and entrepreneur. He previously served as Executive Vice President of Sales and Marketing at Avisena where over a five-year period the company grew an average of 55% per year.

Mr. Lopez del Rincon’s career spans across Professional Employment Organizations/HR Outsourcing Companies (PEOs), Pharmaceuticals, and the University/Academia sector. At ADP TotalSource, a division of ADP (NASDAQ: ADP), he held several senior leadership positions including Vice President of Client Services and Director of Sales. Before joining ADP, Lopez del Rincon spent 4 years as an integral member of the management team at Vincam Human Resources, a fast growing PEO where his contributions lead to their acquisition by ADP in March, 1999. Mr. Lopez del Rincon holds a Bachelor of Science from University of Miami (UM).
